channel.title: Do i really need a retainer?
channel.description: Do i really need a retainer?.. i mean i just got my expander out and now they give me a retainer... and i have to wear it for like 3 months...does it matter if i use it or not? will my teeth get messed up again?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[quote=“itendsnow, post:4, topic:3188”][quote author=poopy4231 link=topic=3693.msg36019#msg36019 date=1148343053]
Do i really need a retainer?.. i mean i just got my expander out and now they give me a retainer… and i have to wear it for like 3 months…does it matter if i use it or not? will my teeth get messed up again?
[/quote]

Just do what the dentist says tbh. If they say wear it, wear it. I followed my dentists recommendations and now teeth are sorted.[/quote]

All the dentists want is money. If they get customers like you they are happy…

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

The denisit said I would never have to have Braces, But he did say I need to start brushing more :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Well just wear it a few times a week. If you don’t, it’ll hurt like a bitch when you put it back in. And if you don’t wear it enough, the orthodontist will have to put braces BACK on. You don’t want that…do you?

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

Just have the dentist pull all your teeth then you dont have to worry about it.

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @power_noob power noob
item.description:
@power_noob wrote:

well the more you wear it the faster you will never have to go back to a orthadontist

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Yes, wear the retainer…if you wear it as the dentist says, you’ll get out of it a lot quicker.

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @itendsnow itendsnow
item.description:
@itendsnow wrote:

poopy4231:

Do i really need a retainer?.. i mean i just got my expander out and now they give me a retainer… and i have to wear it for like 3 months…does it matter if i use it or not? will my teeth get messed up again?

Just do what the dentist says tbh. If they say wear it, wear it. I followed my dentists recommendations and now teeth are sorted.

Read full topic
item.source: Do i really need a retainer?

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

poopy4231:

Do i really need a retainer?.. i mean i just got my expander out and now they give me a retainer… and i have to wear it for like 3 months…does it matter if i use it or not? will my teeth get messed up again?

Exact same thing happened here, but I went to camp and forgot about it for a month or so. Had to get a second set of braces

Read full topic

item.title: Do i really need a retainer?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I was supposed to get a retainer over 3 years ago, they said that in a few years my mouth could develop a very severe case of cross-bite or something like that. 3 years later, mouth is still fine.

Read full topic
